statements: SELECT * FROM MoistureContentOfCompostHeaps;
SELECT compost_heap_id, moisture_level FROM MoistureContentOfCompostHeaps ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM MoistureContentOfCompostHeaps WHERE moisture_level > 0.5;
SELECT compost_heap_id, timestamp FROM MoistureContentOfCompostHeaps ORDER BY moisture_level ASC;
SELECT AVG(moisture_level) AS average_moisture_level FROM MoistureContentOfCompostHeaps;
SELECT compost_heap_id, moisture_level, timestamp FROM MoistureContentOfCompostHeaps WHERE moisture_level > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM MoistureContentOfCompostHeaps WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY moisture_level ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT compost_heap_id, AVG(moisture_level) AS average_moisture FROM MoistureContentOfCompostHeaps GROUP BY compost_heap_id HAVING AVG(moisture_level) > 0.2 ORDER BY average_moisture DESC
SELECT timestamp, COUNT(*) AS total_readings FROM MoistureContentOfCompostHeaps WHERE moisture_level < 0.3 GROUP BY timestamp ORDER BY total_readings DESC
SELECT DISTINCT compost_heap_id FROM MoistureContentOfCompostHeaps WHERE moisture_level < 0.4 ORDER BY compost_heap_id ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM compost_heaps
SELECT heap_name, moisture_content FROM compost_heaps
SELECT * FROM moisture_logs ORDER BY measured_at DESC
SELECT heap_name, moisture_content FROM compost_heaps WHERE moisture_content > 50
SELECT heap_name, moisture_content, last_updated FROM compost_heaps
SELECT heap_name, moisture_content FROM compost_heaps WHERE moisture_content > 50 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT heap_name, moisture_content, last_updated FROM compost_heaps WHERE heap_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY heap_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT heap_name, COUNT(*) AS log_count FROM compost_heaps JOIN moisture_logs ON compost_heaps.id = moisture_logs.heap_id GROUP BY heap_name HAVING log_count > 5 ORDER BY log_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM compost_heaps JOIN moisture_logs ON compost_heaps.id = moisture_logs.heap_id WHERE moisture_level < 40 AND measured_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY measured_at ASC;

SELECT heap_name, AVG(moisture_level) AS avg_moisture FROM compost_heaps JOIN moisture_logs ON compost_heaps.id = moisture_logs.heap_id GROUP BY heap_name HAVING avg_moisture > 60 ORDER BY avg_moisture DESC;
SELECT * FROM CompostHeaps WHERE temperature > 40
SELECT location, moisture_content FROM CompostHeaps WHERE moisture_content < 50
SELECT record_id, compost_id, recorded_at FROM MoistureRecords ORDER BY recorded_at DESC
SELECT username FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%example.com'
SELECT compost_id, location, temperature, moisture_content FROM CompostHeaps
SELECT * FROM CompostHeaps WHERE temperature > 50 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT compost_id, location FROM CompostHeaps WHERE moisture_content < 0.5
SELECT * FROM MoistureRecords WHERE moisture >= 0.7 AND recorded_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY recorded_at ASC
SELECT Users.username, Users.email, CompostHeaps.location FROM Users INNER JOIN CompostHeaps ON Users.user_id = CompostHeaps.compost_id
SELECT Users.username, MoistureRecords.* FROM Users, MoistureRecords WHERE Users.user_id = MoistureRecords.compost_id
SELECT * FROM compost_heaps;
SELECT heap_name, last_updated FROM compost_heaps ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT heap_name, moisture_level FROM compost_heaps WHERE moisture_level > 50;
SELECT heap_id, temperature, log_time FROM temperature_logs WHERE heap_id = 3 ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT heap_name, location, setup_time FROM compost_heaps INNER JOIN heap_locations ON compost_heaps.id = heap_locations.heap_id;
SELECT heap_name, moisture_level FROM compost_heaps WHERE moisture_level > 50 ORDER BY heap_name DESC;
SELECT heap_name, last_updated FROM compost_heaps WHERE heap_name LIKE 'Heap%' AND last_updated > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT t.temperature, h.location FROM temperature_logs t JOIN heap_locations h ON t.heap_id = h.heap_id WHERE t.temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND h.location = 'Backyard' ORDER BY t.temperature DESC;
SELECT h.heap_name, m.moisture_level, m.recorded_time FROM moisture_history m JOIN compost_heaps h ON m.heap_id = h.id WHERE m.moisture_level < 40 ORDER BY m.recorded_time ASC;

SELECT h.heap_name, t.temperature, h.location FROM temperature_logs t JOIN heap_locations h ON t.heap_id = h.heap_id JOIN compost_heaps h ON h.id = t.heap_id WHERE t.temperature > 25 AND h.location IN ('Garden', 'Front Yard') ORDER BY h.location, t.temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM compost_heap
SELECT heap_name, moisture_content FROM compost_heap WHERE moisture_content > 50
SELECT heap_name, moisture_content, updated_at FROM compost_heap ORDER BY updated_at DESC
SELECT * FROM heap_location JOIN compost_heap ON heap_location.heap_id = compost_heap.id
SELECT u.username, c.heap_name, cm.role FROM user u JOIN compost_manager cm ON u.id = cm.user_id JOIN compost_heap c ON cm.heap_id = c.id
SELECT * FROM compost_heap WHERE moisture_content > 50 ORDER BY updated_at DESC
SELECT heap_name, moisture_content, updated_at FROM compost_heap INNER JOIN heap_location ON compost_heap.id = heap_location.heap_id WHERE location LIKE 'Garden%'
SELECT id, heap_name, moisture_content FROM compost_heap WHERE id IN (SELECT heap_id FROM compost_manager WHERE user_id = 123)
SELECT * FROM moisture_log WHERE log_time >= '2022-01-01' AND log_time < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY moisture_level ASC

SELECT user.username, compost_heap.heap_name, heap_location.location FROM user JOIN compost_manager ON user.id = compost_manager.user_id JOIN compost_heap ON compost_manager.heap_id = compost_heap.id JOIN heap_location ON compost_manager.heap_id = heap_location.heap_id WHERE role = 'Manager'
